name: Maestro & the Four Kingdoms - Tuba Minion Fight
name_original: Maestro & the Four Kingdoms - Tuba Minion Fight
description:
[This game is a Demo]

Available in English and Spanish

A game based on Tuba Memes, you follow the Maestro's quest to restore the peace of the four kingdoms, in this game you will fight a Tuba Minion, the lowest kind of soldier, but be careful, a soldier is still a soldier not matter what rank it is, manage your points, level up and use devastating special attacks to defeat him.

[How to play]

When your gauge gets full you will gain one action point (you can stack up to 10), Click on the enemy and the actions menu will pop up, you can use the action points to attack, defend, talk or to use special attacks.

Music by:

Shop theme by epicman 720: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ndBII9d6GsY

Battle theme by Julian Windram: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktRXa0ues98
